subscription.title: Subscription
subscription.select_plan_description: Select the subscription plan that best meets the needs of your agency
subscription.basic_description: Perfect for starting and managing a small vehicle fleet
subscription.pro_description: Ideal for growing agencies with advanced needs
subscription.enterprise_description: Complete solution for large fleets and specific requirements
subscription.why_choose_description: A complete platform for managing your vehicle rental agency

advantages.title: Why Choose Easy Rental?
advantages.secure_description: All your data is protected with the latest security protocols
advantages.fast_description: Get your agency online in less than 5 minutes
advantages.support_description: Our team is available 24/7 to help you

subscription.trusted_by_description: Discover what our customers say about our platform
subscription.testimonial1: Easy Rental has allowed us to increase our bookings by 60% in just 3 months. The interface is intuitive and the customer support is exceptional.
subscription.testimonial2: Our management process has become much more efficient since we started using this platform. Highly recommended!
subscription.testimonial3: The best decision we've made for our business. The value for money is unbeatable.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your subscription plan at any time from your dashboard.
faq.a2: No, there are no setup fees. You only pay for the subscription plan you choose.
faq.q3: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a3: We accept credit/debit cards and mobile money payments.
faq.q4: Is there a free trial period?
faq.a4: Yes, all our plans include a 14-day free trial with no commitment.

subscription.ready_to_start_description: Sign up today and start efficiently managing your vehicle fleet

register.title: Organization Registration
register.subtitle: Create your organization space and start managing your vehicle fleet

steps.personal_description: Information about the owner or main manager
steps.payment_description: Complete your subscription with secure payment
steps.confirmation_description: Verification and finalization of your registration

register.payment_note: By making this payment, you agree to the terms of service and privacy policy. Your subscription will automatically renew until canceled.

tooltips.username: Choose a unique username that will be used to log in to the platform.
tooltips.phone: Recommended format: +237 6XX XXX XXX for Cameroonian numbers.
tooltips.password: Use at least 6 characters with letters and numbers for better security.
tooltips.org_name: The official name of your company or rental agency.
tooltips.business_actor_id: Unique identifier provided by the Yowyob payment system.

note.title: Important information
note.content: This information will be used to create your administrator account. Make sure it is accurate as it will be linked to your organization.

important.title: Required information
important.content: The Business Actor ID is necessary to complete registration. If you don't have one, please contact our customer service.

errors.title: Validation Error
errors.required_fields: Please fill in all required fields
errors.password_length: Password must be at least 6 characters long
errors.required_organization_fields: Please fill in all required organization fields

success.title: Registration Successful!
success.message: Your organization has been registered successfully and your subscription is active.
success.email_note: A confirmation email has been sent to your email address with your account and subscription details.

payment.title: Payment
payment.subtitle: Complete your subscription payment

card.cvc_tooltip: 3-digit code on the back of your card
card.name: Cardholder Name

mobile.notice: Make sure the phone number is associated with an active Mobile Money account.
mobile.step1: Enter your phone number and validate
mobile.step2: You will receive a payment request on your phone
mobile.step3: Validate the payment with your PIN code

payment.secure: Your payment is secure and encrypted

errors.generic: An error occurred while processing your payment

success.title: Payment Successful!
success.message: Your payment has been processed successfully.

dashboard.welcome_subtitle: Here's an overview of your rental agency
dashboard.create_organization_prompt: You need to create an organization to access the dashboard.
